pr_title: [#1497] Don't clear the cache on bulk changes to errors or warnings

timeline.message: [#1497] Don't clear the cache on bulk changes to errors or warnings

timeline.bodyText: looks like we are all but consistent on how to write life cycle
timeline.author: cdietrich

replies.bodyText:
As usual
I recently enabled spell checking in my workspaces. Now I'm trying to be a good boy scout when I come across "unconventional" spelling.
replies.author: szarnekow
